    • Know Ideas

    Grey Vaisius and I wrote a 130 page book about digital and analogue life. We called it Know Ideas. This project didn’t burnout our friendship. In fact, it proved to me working with others is more fun than working alone. If it wasn’t so expensive to produce, I’d offer a link for you to buy. The book is trade size(9″x6″); a comfortable size to casually read. The book features interactive spreads that depict concepts of web interactions through the printed page. Some of these interactive features include: a page fold to hide/show information, French folds that hide the backend from the frontend, layers of acetate for the reader to visually experience layers of meaning, and mirror paper — a poetic link to the screen.
